txt.en: Congratulations!  You have Mastered a Craft Tier.  You can now obtain Critical Success results from your recipes of that Tier, and can use Optional Ingredients to improve your critical success chance.  In addition, you can now work on Mastery of the next craft Tier.

Congratulations! You have Mastered a Craft Tier. You can now obtain Critical Success results from your recipes of that Tier, and can use Optional Ingredients to improve your critical success chance. In addition, you can now work on Mastery of the next craft Tier.
